title: The provisions of this Regulation shall not be applicable to the structures where development of plot, where such tolerated/protected structures are situated, is proposed to be undertaken or in progress
clause_text: The provisions of this Regulation shall not be applicable to the structures where development of plot, where such tolerated/protected structures are situated, is proposed to be undertaken or in progress.
section: Removal and re-accommodation of tolerated /protected structures falling in the alignment of road: -
